mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ONLINEORDERINFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ONLINEORDERINFO (TRANSSEQNBR, TRANSDATE, MERNBR, MERSEQNBR, DOWNSYSTRANSNBR, DOWNSYSTRANSTIME, DOWNSYSTRANSDATE, MERTRANSTIME, CLEARDATE, TRANSTIME, TRANSCODE, PAYERCARDTYPCD, PAYEECARDTYPCD, PAYERACCTNBR, PAYERACCTTYPCD, PAYERACCTKIND, PAYERACCTDEPTNBR, PAYERACCTNAME, PAYEEACCTNBR, PAYEEACCTTYPCD, PAYEEACCTKIND, PAYEEACCTDEPTNBR, PAYEEACCTNAME, CURRENCYCD, TRANSAMT, REFUNDEDAMT, UNREFUNDEDAMT, RESPCODE, RESPMSG, FEEAMT, TRANSSTATUS, PROCSTEP, PROCSTATUS, MEMO1, CRTDATETIME, DATELASTMAINT ) values (#{transseqnbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mernbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merseqnbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downsystransnbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downsystranstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{downsystransdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mertranstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cleardate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{transtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payercardtypcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeecardtypcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeracctnbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeraccttypcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeracctkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeracctdeptnbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeracctname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeacctnbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeaccttypcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeacctkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeacctdeptnbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeacctname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currencycd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refundedamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unrefundedamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{respcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respmsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procstep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now() )
